question: Smart-Up grants, which was making news recently, is associated with which Indian bank?
explanation:
HDFC Bank announced that it is inviting applications from start-ups and entrepreneurs for its SmartUp grants under Parivartan, its corporate social responsibility (CSR) brand.
The bank is to focus on start-ups in the education (edtech) and skill development sector this year. HDFC bank has partnered with nine start-up incubators registered with the Electronics and IT Ministry, to mentor the start-ups selected for the grant.
